meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of epithelium.
meanings.sent1: The epithelial cells form a protective layer on the skin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the epithelial tissue under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The epithelial layer acted like a shield, keeping the harmful substances out.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth and protective as an epithelial barrier.
meanings.sent5: The epithelial lining of the stomach helps in digestion by absorbing nutrients.
